```{ojs}
(() => {
  const iframe = document.createElement("iframe");
  iframe.src = "pipe_map.html";
  iframe.width = "1200";
  iframe.height = "800";
  iframe.style.border = "none";
  iframe.overflow = true;
  // Wait until the iframe is fully loaded
  iframe.addEventListener("load", () => {
      iframe.scr.contentWindow.flyTo(51.021422, 6.563473, 12);
    }
  );
  return iframe;
})()

```

```{ojs}
(() => {
  const container = document.createElement("div");

  const iframe = document.createElement("iframe");
  iframe.src = "pipe_map.html";
  iframe.width = "1200";
  iframe.height = "800";
  iframe.style.border = "none";

  return container;
})
```
